title: Conversation Capture for History Review
description: Extend claude-monitor to capture conversation history from Claude Code sessions for review and prompt learning. Includes: JSONL/TXT parsing with hash dedup, artifact extraction (code blocks, tool calls), tiered output storage, config file metadata extraction, project-grouped API and UI. Design doc: docs/plans/2026-01-08-conversation-capture-design.md

title: Conversation API endpoints
description: Add endpoints: GET /conversations, GET /conversations/:id, GET /conversations/:id/entries, GET /conversations/:id/artifacts, GET /projects/:id/conversations, GET /artifacts/search
close_reason: API endpoints implemented and tested - conversations, artifacts, config-snapshots

title: Document claude-monitor unique features for potential upstream contribution
description: After gaining CASS familiarity, document which claude-monitor features remain unique and valuable: REST API, background daemon scanning, config file change history. Assess effort to port upstream vs build separately.

title: Migrate claude-monitor from Node.js to Bun
description: Replace better-sqlite3 with bun:sqlite, update package.json scripts, and update register-server.ps1 to use bun instead of node
close_reason: Migration complete: Node.js to Bun with bun:sqlite

title: Explore CASS TUI and search capabilities
description: Learn CASS interface: TUI navigation (vim keys), search syntax (boolean, wildcards, phrases), filtering (agents, workspaces, time ranges), bookmarks. Document keyboard shortcuts and common workflows.

title: Configure CASS remote sources for multi-machine sync
description: Set up CASS sources feature to sync from other machines via SSH. Test rsync-based sync, verify provenance tracking works, explore workspace path rewriting for cross-machine consistency.

title: JSONL/TXT conversation parser
description: Core extraction logic with line-by-line hash dedup. Parse roles, content, timestamps from JSONL format. Support TXT transcript format as fallback.

title: Migrate from claude-monitor to CASS
description: Replace claude-monitor with CASS (coding_agent_session_search) as the primary tool for searching Claude Code conversation history. CASS provides: 11-agent support, semantic search, remote sync, cross-platform, TUI. Migration preserves learning about unique features that may be contributed upstream later.

title: Evaluate CASS HTML export for sharing conversations
description: Test CASS HTML export feature including encryption options. Evaluate as replacement for web dashboard use case - can exported HTML serve similar purposes? Document export workflow.

title: Artifact extractor service
description: Extract structured content: code blocks (with language), tool calls (with params), tool results (with tiered storage), JSON objects. Capture prompt context for learning.
close_reason: Artifact extractor service implemented and tested - extracts tool calls, results, code blocks

title: Test CASS semantic/hybrid search
description: Enable and test semantic search with FastEmbed. Compare lexical vs semantic vs hybrid (RRF) results. Evaluate search quality for finding past conversations about specific topics.

title: Config file metadata extractor
description: Parse settings.local.json, plugin.json, hooks.md, CLAUDE.md. Store structured metadata (not verbatim content). Link snapshots to conversations.

title: Schema migration for conversation tables
description: Add 5 new tables: conversations, conversation_entries, artifacts, conversation_parse_state, config_snapshots. See design doc for full schema.
close_reason: Schema migration complete - 5 tables and 2 views created

title: Decision: Archive claude-monitor or maintain alongside CASS
description: After completing CASS evaluation, decide: (1) Archive claude-monitor repo entirely, (2) Keep for REST API/daemon features not in CASS, (3) Fork CASS and add missing features there. Document decision rationale.

title: Install and configure CASS on Windows
description: Install CASS (coding_agent_session_search) from justSteve fork. Run install.ps1, verify binary works, run initial index of Claude Code sessions. Document any Windows-specific issues encountered.

title: Conversation browser frontend
description: New UI tab with project tree, conversation list, detail view. Tabs for entries/code blocks/tool calls/errors. Error highlighting and filtering.
close_reason: Frontend implemented - conversations.html with three-panel layout, API integration, tabbed views
